title: Mercury Transit in the 2nd House for Taurus Ascendant
summary: Mercury transiting the 2nd house highlights speech, finances, family values, and decision-making related to resources. This phase sharpens financial judgment and encourages income through communication, analysis, or business dealings. Speech becomes influential, impacting both family dynamics and professional negotiations. However, over-calculation or sharp words can disturb harmony if not handled carefully. When guided with clarity and ethics, this transit supports smart financial planning, persuasive communication, and stability through informed choices.

sections.heading: Speech & Communication
points: Risk of sharp or critical tone

closing: Mercury in the 2nd house refines wealth and speech through intellect. Conscious communication converts ideas into lasting stability.
